name: Daniel Sean Lissner
title: Software Engineer/Developer
summary: Motivated, supportive, self-starting software engineer with experience throughout the stack emphasizing quality, best practices, and simplicity

work_history_attributes.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Designed and developed hardware enabled SaaS product for restaurant/bar operators to monitor bar activity, events, and inventory in real time
Built front-end single-page React web app using React 16, React Router, Redux, Redux-ORM, Apollo GraphQL, Nivo Charts, Chart.js, Yup/Formik, Bootstrap/Reactstrap, Jest/Enzyme
Developed RESTful API and GraphQL API microservices via Ruby on Rails, graphql-ruby, Devise/devise-jwt, Cancan, RSpec/FactoryBot/Faker
Managed environments and infrastructure via Docker/Docker Swarm
Established and managed agile development processes and workflows
Worked with stakeholders to define product and features, establish requirements and set deliverables and timelines

startup_experience_attributes.title: Co-founder/CTO
highlights: Designed and developed SaaS platform for managing mentoring programs featuring matching, messaging, custom on-boarding and application workflows, check-ins, reporting and exporting, SMS notifications
Traditional Rails "monolith" app with Devise, ActiveRecord, Formtastic, ActiveAdmin, paperclip, ERB templates,  RSpec, etc. with jQuery and Bootstrap for UI
Deployed on Heroku and integrated with multiple cloud services (MailChimp, AWS S3, Twilio, etc.)

community_efforts_attributes.description: Founding board-member of Memphis Technology Foundation
Organizer of Memphis Java User Group
Co-organizer of Security B-Sides Memphis information security conference
